# imageScaling

**Instance Property**

The scaling mode applied to make the cell’s image fit the frame of the image view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var imageScaling: NSImageScaling { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageScaling/scaleProportionallyDown].

## Specifying the visual characteristics

- **imageFrameStyle**: The style of frame that appears around the image.
- **imageAlignment**: The alignment of the cell’s image inside the image view.
- **animates**: A Boolean value indicating whether the image view automatically plays animated images.
- **contentTintColor**
